allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: goals capture enhancement - GoalsCapture on lets-talk and enroll pages, duplicate email fix, two CTAs on results page

- Results page: Add "Talk to Coach" CTA going to /lets-talk with goals
- /lets-talk page: Add GoalsCapture fallback when goals not in URL
- /enroll page: Add GoalsCapture fallback when goals not in URL
- Certificate email: Two CTAs - /enroll and /lets-talk with goals
- /api/children/[id]: New endpoint to fetch child age/goals
- Duplicate email fix: Idempotency check using certificate_email_sent_at

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
